resources:
Qart
Gallery More Convert Text Save Share Revert AboutShare Scan cancelled Share via Please press back key again to exit Please input your own text to generate QR code, or press QR code button on the right Saved in file:///android_asset/pages/about-en.html Qart %s
Qart is used to generate QR code that merge a picture. So the QR code looks more beautiful. Please try it https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=io.github.scola.qart Invite to use Qart app Share via Close Converting QR code, please wait several second Choose color BLACKWHITE or COLORFUL Qart can generate blackwhite or colorful QR Code. Please select proper color for higher recognition rate. If the selected color brightness is too light or similar with selected picture, the QR code may not be detected BLACKWHITE COLORFUL You selected white color, generated QR code cannot be detected You selected color is too light, generated QR code may not be detected Mode Select one mode Normal Picture Logo Embed Color GIF EMBED LOGO START Only picture mode support GIF QR Result Open Copy Import QR text has been copied Can not find activity to open Scan Scan QR Code Read QR Image Can not decode image Scan or read QR code Detect Send Text is too long. Please input shorter text
